title: [Clien] Unable to gift a friend even if we are friends

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Attempted to gift my friend the only annie skin he doesnt have upon clicking the purchase button it states not friends

1. Click Store
2. Click Gifting center
3. Pick friend
4. Choose specific skin
5. Click Purchase
6. Purchase fails

replies.body: Same. Been on this guy's friend list for about a year now.

https://gyazo.com/3df8ebeec71d4cbd9134475bd068165b

I can second this. Trying to gift someone who's been on my contact list for about two years now.
